meanings.meaning_en_US: To pull someone or something along forcefully or with effort.

examples.sentence: He had to [drag] the heavy box across the floor.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他不得不將沉重的箱子拖過地板

examples.sentence: The dog was [dragging] its leash as it ran.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 狗在奔跑時拖著牽繩

examples.sentence: She felt [dragged] into the conversation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她感覺被拖進對話中

meanings.meaning_en_US: The period of life from age 13 to 19.

examples.sentence: Many changes occur during the [teens].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在青少年時期，許多變化會發生。

examples.sentence: Teens often face a lot of pressure from peers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 青少年經常面臨來自同齡人的壓力。

examples.sentence: She started high school in her [teens].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在青少年時期開始上高中。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To establish the truth or correctness of something.

examples.sentence: She called to [confirm] her appointment.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她打電話來確認約會

examples.sentence: Please [confirm] your attendance at the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請確認您是否參加會議

examples.sentence: The results [confirm] the initial findings.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 結果確認了最初的研究結果

meanings.meaning_en_US: The process or period of gathering in crops.

examples.sentence: The autumn [harvest] was plentiful this year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 今年的秋季收成豐富。

examples.sentence: Farmers celebrate the [harvest] festival.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 農民們慶祝收成節。

examples.sentence: A good [harvest] is essential for the economy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 良好的收成對經濟至關重要。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A heap or stack of items.

examples.sentence: She placed the books in a [pile] on the table.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她把書放在桌子上的一堆。

examples.sentence: The leaves formed a [pile] in the yard.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 樹葉在院子裡形成了一堆。

examples.sentence: He sorted the cards into a [pile] for each game.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他把卡片分成每場遊戲的一堆。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To accumulate or stack several items.

examples.sentence: They [piled] the leaves into bags.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們把樹葉堆進袋子裡。

examples.sentence: She [piled] the clothes on the bed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她把衣服堆在床上。

examples.sentence: Don't [pile] too much work on your desk.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不要在你的桌子上堆太多工作。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The act of keeping money or resources for future use.

examples.sentence: She made a [saving] for her vacation plans.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為假期計劃儲蓄了一筆錢。

examples.sentence: He looked for ways to increase his [savings].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他尋找增加儲蓄的方法。

examples.sentence: Regular [savings] can help you achieve financial goals.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 定期儲蓄有助於實現財務目標。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Not firmly or tightly fixed in place; able to be moved or shifted.

examples.sentence: The screw is too [loose] to hold the shelf.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個螺絲太鬆了，無法固定架子。

examples.sentence: Her dress was [loose] and floated in the wind.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的裙子是鬆鬆的，在風中飄動。

examples.sentence: Make sure the lid is not [loose] before you bake.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 烘烤前，確保蓋子不是鬆的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To mix a substance or liquid by moving it around with a spoon or stick.

examples.sentence: Please [stir] the soup to ensure it heats evenly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請攪拌湯，以確保它均勻加熱。

examples.sentence: He began to [stir] the paint before applying it to the canvas.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在塗抹畫布之前開始攪拌顏料。

examples.sentence: Do not forget to [stir] your coffee before drinking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在喝咖啡之前別忘了攪拌。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A cylindrical container or object, often used for holding substances or transporting materials.

examples.sentence: He put the map in a protective [tube].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他把地圖放進了一個保護性圓筒中。

examples.sentence: The [tube] was filled with toothpaste.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個圓筒裡裝的是牙膏。

examples.sentence: She rolled the poster into a [tube] for safekeeping.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她把海報捲成圓筒以便保存。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An area or region distinguished from adjacent parts by a distinctive feature or characteristic.

examples.sentence: The school is located in a quiet [zone].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這所學校位於安靜的區域。

examples.sentence: There are many parks in the residential [zone].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 住宅區裡有很多公園。

examples.sentence: This is a no-parking [zone].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是個禁止停車的區域。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A flat, thin cake made from batter and cooked on a hot surface.

examples.sentence: She topped her [pancake] with fresh strawberries.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她用新鮮草莓為煎餅裝飾。

examples.sentence: He loves to eat a stack of [pancakes] for breakfast.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡早餐時吃一堆煎餅。

examples.sentence: You can add syrup to your [pancake] if you like.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果你願意，可以在煎餅上加糖漿。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An insect related to the butterfly, typically nocturnal with a stout body and dull wings.

examples.sentence: A [moth] flew into the light.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一隻蛾子飛進了光亮中。

examples.sentence: The [moth] was attracted to the flames.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這隻蛾子被火焰吸引。

examples.sentence: She saw a [moth] fluttering near the window.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她看到一隻蛾子在窗邊振翅飛舞。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The back part of the foot below the ankle.

examples.sentence: He stepped on my [heel] accidentally.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他不小心踩到了我的腳跟

examples.sentence: She wore a Band-Aid on her [heel].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的腳跟上貼著創可貼

examples.sentence: The shoe's [heel] was too high for comfort.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這雙鞋的跟對我來說太高了，不舒服

meanings.meaning_en_US: A natural earthy material that is plastic when wet but hardens when dried or fired.

examples.sentence: She shaped a pot out of [clay].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她用黏土塑造了一個陶罐。

examples.sentence: The artist loves to work with [clay].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位藝術家喜歡用黏土創作。

examples.sentence: We used [clay] to make sculptures.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們用黏土製作雕塑。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To secure (something) with a lock.

examples.sentence: Please [lock] the door when you leave.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 離開時請鎖上門。

examples.sentence: Make sure to [lock] your bike.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 務必鎖好你的自行車。

examples.sentence: Can you [lock] this cabinet for security?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能把這個櫃子鎖上以保證安全嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who creates or devises a new method, idea, or product.

examples.sentence: The [inventor] of the telephone changed communication forever.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 電話的發明家永遠改變了通信方式。

examples.sentence: Many inventors work tirelessly to bring their ideas to life.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多發明家不辭辛勞地將自己的創意變成現實。

examples.sentence: An [inventor] must be curious and persistent.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 發明家必須保持好奇心和堅持。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To disappear suddenly and completely.

examples.sentence: The magician made the rabbit [vanish] from the hat.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 魔術師讓兔子從帽子裡消失。

examples.sentence: She watched the sunset and felt her worries [vanish].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她看著夕陽，感覺到煩惱消失了。

examples.sentence: With a flick of his wrist, he made the coin [vanish].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他輕輕一揮手腕，硬幣就消失了。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To allocate a task or responsibility to someone.

examples.sentence: The teacher will [assign] homework to the students.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 老師將會給學生們指派作業。

examples.sentence: Please [assign] someone to handle this project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請指派一個人來處理這個項目。

examples.sentence: He was [assigned] to a new role.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他被指派到一個新角色。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A metric unit of measurement equal to 1,000 meters.

examples.sentence: The city is only five [kilometers] away.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這座城市距離只有五公里。

examples.sentence: She runs three [kilometers] every morning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她每天早上跑三公里。

examples.sentence: This trail is approximately ten [kilometers] long.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這條小徑大約有十公里長。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To let liquid fall in drops.

examples.sentence: Water began to [drip] from the faucet.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 水開始從水龍頭滴落。

examples.sentence: The paint will [drip] if you don’t hold it upright.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果你不垂直持有，油漆會滴落。

examples.sentence: She watched the icicles [drip] in the sunlight.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她看著冰柱在陽光下滴水。
